caption.title: Peak dates, peak prevalence, area not infected and final size, range parameter 10.0 in the covariance function.
caption.p: Peak dates for the global mean prevalence curve, peak prevalence, mean area not infected and mean final size as a function of clustering, with 95% confidence bands, when the range parameter of the Mat√©rn covariance function was increased from 5.0 to 10.0. The lines correspond to the baseline scenario, 90% travel restrictions, 99% travel restrictions and 100% travel restrictions. Top left: peak date. Top right: peak prevalence. Bottom left: area not infected. Bottom right: final size.
Click here for additional data file.
